Оценка: 7,8/10

You know for the first number #1 online first person shooter, you'd expect this game as well as others in this era to age. This is not one of them.

Counter-Strike: Source has always been a favorite that mostly my friends and I would play. Also, this game will improve your hipfire accuracy because it's EXTREMELY encouraged. If you're new to the Steam scene, get this game. There's still a whole lot of servers to join, players to hang out on, and have endless fun!

In the series of these games Source still remains the more populated option which results in a more regular gaming experience.   Graphically it may not be the best available, but the players still come around to play which is more than half the game. 

I would recommend this over Global Offensive as I've experienced extreme difficulty in finding a regular community when compared to Source.

What can I say? Just a great game to either test your abilities against the 'Expert' level bots (who get headshots with scout rifles pretty much 90% of the time :D ) or play with friends. Definitely try pitting you and maybe 4-8 human players against 20 bots and try to contain the 'swarm' - its loads of fun.
A classic competitive fps.

Fun! Repetitive but Fun. Mods and new gamemodes like zombie mode, zombie escape, team deathmatch and way many more. WARNING: May be dificult for beginners so check some tutorials in youtube if you want to kill and not die. Badly.

Still a game I would, personaly, advise others to buy. Somehow I enjoy Source more than GO, the oldschool feel and gameplay takes me back to the old times. There are still a lot of enjoyable servers out there, even though I tend to visit the same server every time.

So if you really enjoyed playing CS 1.5/6 back in the days (maybe even CZ, even though i've never played it), it's definitely something you want to buy :)
